title: Mailvox: Finding common ground
author: VD
content_html:
Cedarford makes Nate’s day:

Yeah, and Beloved Maximum War Leader just had his flunkies at the Pentagon unveil instead of a light base closure list, a massive bloodletting to save 48.8 billion dollars. 180 of America’s remaining 425 bases, plus dozens closing overseas….

New England is virtually stripped of defense infrastructure by Bush’s appointees.

What can you expect Massachusetts to do? Obviously, they need the land for gay honeymoon getaways.
content_text:
Cedarford makes Nate’s day:
Yeah, and Beloved Maximum War Leader just had his flunkies at the Pentagon unveil instead of a light base closure list, a massive bloodletting to save 48.8 billion dollars. 180 of America’s remaining 425 bases, plus dozens closing overseas….
